parameters.emailMessage/Subject: Your poster request is approved and sent to Print
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Hi,

Your Poster Request is approved and sent to COPIT Team for Printing.

You will recevice an email from COPIT team after your request is complete. If you have any questions or concerns, you can email the COPIT Team at rxcopit@central.uh.edu
Poster name: @{outputs('Feed_Details_into_Sharepoint')?['body/TITLEOFPOSTER']}
Approved by: @{items('For_each_Ack_Email_Default_Gloss_White_Poster-Mail_to_User')?['responder/displayName']}
Approved on: @{body('Completion_Date_Time_Converstion')}
Type: Gloss White
Requester: @{outputs('Feed_Details_into_Sharepoint')?['body/FirstName']}


Thanks & Regards,
UH-COPIT

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: Your poster request is approved and sent to Print
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Hi @{outputs('Feed_Details_into_Sharepoint')?['body/FirstName']},

Your Poster Request is approved and sent to IT Team for Printing.

You will recevice an email from COPIT team after your request is complete. If you have any questions or concerns, you can email the COPIT Team at rxcopit@central.uh.edu

Poster name: @{outputs('Feed_Details_into_Sharepoint')?['body/TITLEOFPOSTER']}
Approved by: @{items('For_each_Ack_Email_Default_White_Poster-Mail_to_User')?['responder/displayName']}

Type: Default White Matte

Thanks & Regards,
UH-COPIT

Hi @{triggerOutputs()?['body/Name/FirstAndLast']},

Your @{triggerOutputs()?['body/PosterInformation/Title']}  poster is not approved.


Please contact your @{variables('Facultyname')}  advisor/faculty regarding the poster approval.

Hi COPIT,


The poster request was unsuccesful. This is due to wrong cougarnet mail address by the requester or if you added new faculty email please recheck the mail address of the faculty in the sharepoint:

The requester will not receive the confirmation mail as  requester entered wrong cougarnet mail address
